amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 327 that grants an easement through the Chugach National Forest to the Chugach Alaska Corporation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 327 that grants Chugach Alaska Corporation an easement for public roads and related facilities that were conveyed to the corporation pursuant to the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act.

action.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 249 (Roll No. 328).
